_comment: Update weekly specials. weekOf should be the Monday of the current week.

items.name: Rustic Lentil & Barley Soup
items.description: Slow-simmered green lentils and pearl barley in a savory vegetable broth with tomato paste, olive oil, and herbs

items.name: Chicken Giardiniera & White Bean Press
items.description: Roasted chicken thigh, smashed white beans with olive oil and garlic, giardiniera mix, and mozzarella. Pressed crisp and served hot
notes: Served with pickle + Chef’s Weekly Side
Available as a half in Pick 2 & Pick 3 combos

items.name: Creamy Polenta with Artichoke & Herb Oil
items.description: Soft cornmeal polenta finished with evaporated milk, topped with chopped artichokes, oregano, basil, and olive oil
notes: Served warm in a composed bowl

items.name: White Bean, Artichoke & Caper Antipasto
items.description: Marinated white beans with artichokes, capers, olive oil, and champagne vinegar

items.name: Chocolate Oat Bars
items.description: Old fashioned oats baked with bittersweet and semi-sweet chocolate chips, brown sugar, and sweetened condensed milk

items.name: Warm Farro, White Bean & Herb Bowl
items.description: Farro and white beans tossed with olive oil, balsamic glaze, oregano, and black pepper
